plot: A girl is fired from a job she hates at a coffee shop in Brooklyn, only to realize that she has no prospects beyond barista-hood.
title: That Other Short
plot_es: A girl is fired from a job she hates at a coffee shop in Brooklyn, only to realize that she has no prospects beyond barista-hood.
plot_en: A girl is fired from a job she hates at a coffee shop in Brooklyn, only to realize that she has no prospects beyond barista-hood.
